summary: Implements a Torch‑ORT backend for the Optimum Benchmark suite, offering utilities to configure model arguments, load models (including pretrained and weight‑less variants), and run training using ONNX Runtime with optional PEFT and fast weight initialization support.
business_intent: Facilitate performance benchmarking of PyTorch models accelerated by ONNX Runtime, enabling users to assess training speed, resource consumption, and scalability across various configurations.
